programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon.(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Desperate to find a cure for her daughter Sharon's bizarre episodes, Rose (Radha Mitchell) flees with Sharon and heads for Silent Hill, the town her daughter names in her trances. But as they approach the deserted town, a mysterious figure appears, forcing Rose to crash. When she comes to, Sharon is gone, and suddenly Rose must enlist the help of a determined police officer (Laurie Holden) from a nearby town to help on her desperate quest to find her child.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Ben Hall
programme.desc: Focusing on the last nine months of Hall's life, when he's a well-established bushranger along with his accomplices, the film explores the relationships within the gang, their robberies and the details surrounding Hall's betrayal and controversial death at the hands of the police on May 5th, 1865. Starring Jack Martin.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: This movie chronicles the journey of a group of enslaved Africans who overtake their captor's ship and attempt to return to their beloved homeland. When the ship is seized, the captives are brought to the United States where they are charged with murder and await their fate in prison. A courtroom battle ensues that captures the attention of the entire nation. For the men and woman on trial, it's simply a fight for the basic right of freedom. Directed by Steven Spielberg.(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.(n)

programme.title: Jackals
programme.desc: When Justin Powell (Ben Sullivan) is captured by two ski-masked men and dragged back to a secluded cabin, it's anything but a standard kidnapping. Waiting for Justin at the cabin are his father (Johnathon Schaech) mother (Deborah Kara Unger), brother (Nick Roux) and former girlfriend (Chelsea Ricketts). Together, they attempt to free him from the sinister brainwashing he's undergone at the hands of a vicious cult known as The Jackals.(n)

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.(n)

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.(n)

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade.(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade.(n)

programme.title: The Prowler
programme.desc: An unknown killer, clad in World War II US Army fatigues, stalks a sleepy New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35-year-old double murder, which leads him back to the scene of the crime at the college spring dance.(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic.(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Desperate to find a cure for her daughter Sharon's bizarre episodes, Rose (Radha Mitchell) flees with Sharon and heads for Silent Hill, the town her daughter names in her trances. But as they approach the deserted town, a mysterious figure appears, forcing Rose to crash. When she comes to, Sharon is gone, and suddenly Rose must enlist the help of a determined police officer (Laurie Holden) from a nearby town to help on her desperate quest to find her child.(n)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo.(n)

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth.(n)

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: High school geek Arnie Cunningham falls in love with Christine, a bright red 1957 Plymouth Fury which has seen much better days. After restoring the car to its original condition, his friends notice that the car is not the only thing that is changing. Arnie seems to spend more and more time with his car. He's also developed a cocky arrogance which does not seem like the real Arnie at all.(n)

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.(n)

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have.(n)

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life.(n)

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: High school geek Arnie Cunningham falls in love with Christine, a bright red 1957 Plymouth Fury which has seen much better days. After restoring the car to its original condition, his friends notice that the car is not the only thing that is changing. Arnie seems to spend more and more time with his car. He's also developed a cocky arrogance which does not seem like the real Arnie at all.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: A pair of horny American college students on a backpacking trip across Europe stumble into a hellish nightmare of murder for profit in this horror smash from director Eli Roth ("Cabin Fever"), starring Jay Hernandez and Derek Richardson, with Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova, Jan Vlasak, Jana Kaderabkova and Jennifer Lim.(n)

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?(n)

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.(n)

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: High school geek Arnie Cunningham falls in love with Christine, a bright red 1957 Plymouth Fury which has seen much better days. After restoring the car to its original condition, his friends notice that the car is not the only thing that is changing. Arnie seems to spend more and more time with his car. He's also developed a cocky arrogance which does not seem like the real Arnie at all.(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.(n)

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.(n)

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare.(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Desperate to find a cure for her daughter Sharon's bizarre episodes, Rose (Radha Mitchell) flees with Sharon and heads for Silent Hill, the town her daughter names in her trances. But as they approach the deserted town, a mysterious figure appears, forcing Rose to crash. When she comes to, Sharon is gone, and suddenly Rose must enlist the help of a determined police officer (Laurie Holden) from a nearby town to help on her desperate quest to find her child.(n)

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Eddie Murphy is on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who's been abducted by an evil cult. He battles a band of henchmen, scrambles through a booby-trapped chamber of horrors and traverses Tibet to obtain a sacred dagger. But it's his wit that turns out to be his sharpest weapon.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: Samuel Beckett: Waiting for Andre
programme.desc: The story of driver Samuel Beckett's school runs with 12-year-old Andre Roussimoff, who is too big for the school bus and later becomes legendary wrestler Andre the Giant. Over the course of a year their friendship evolves.(n)

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: The two friends go on more drug-influenced misadventures, as Cheech must deal with losing his job and Chong parties in Hollywood. Featuring the screen debut of Pee Wee Herman (Paul Reubens).(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat.(n)

programme.title: New Wave: Dare to be Different
programme.desc: In August, 1982, a small group of radio visionaries at WLIR Long Island knew they couldn't compete with the mega radio stations in New York City. With one brave decision, they changed the sound of radio forever. Program Director Denis McNamara, the crew at the station and the biggest artists of the era tell the story of how they battled the FCC, the record labels, mega-radio and all the conventional rules to create a musical movement that brought the New Wave to America - including bands like U2, Talking Heads, Depeche Mode and Blondie.(n)

programme.title: Shot
programme.desc: Three lives are irrevocably changed when a gun is accidentally fired on a busy LA street. Mark (Noah Wyle) and Phoebe (Sharon Leal) are in the midst of a breakup. Miguel (Jorge Lendeborg, Jr.), a bullied teenager, is given an illegal gun by his cousin for protection. As Miguel handles it, the gun accidently fires and Mark is hit by the bullet.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans.(n)

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world.(n)

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: An ex-convict who is desperate to pay off his debts schemes to rob his wealthy employer's home, unaware that the place is rigged with a series of fiendishly deadly traps. Josh Stewart, Michael Reilly Burke and Andrea Roth star in this clever horror thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Thomas Jane ("Deep Blue Sea," "Dreamcatcher") steps into the steel-tipped boots of Marvel Comics hero Frank Castle, a.k.a. The Punisher, a crusading vigilante out to topple the crime czar (John Travolta) who murdered his family. Rebecca Romijn, Ben Foster, Samantha Mathis, Roy Scheider and Will Patton costar in this crackling adaptation from writer/director Jonathan Hensleigh ("Jumanji," "Armageddon").(n)

programme.title: Get The Girl
programme.desc: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping in order to play the hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along.(n)

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers.(n)

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.(n)

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent').(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.(n)

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: When six strangers with unspeakable pasts wake up imprisoned in an abandoned warehouse, they discover they are being forced to participate in an evil experiment. Five of them must die, only one can live and they have two hours to decide amongst themselves who survives. The clock is ticking and if they don't decide, they will all die.(n)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches.(n)

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks.(n)

programme.title: Punching Henry
programme.desc: A journeyman comedian (Henry Phillips) is lured to L.A. by a TV producer (J.K. Simmons) who wants to make him a reality star. As reality sets in, he must decide whether his legacy will be to tell jokes for a living or become the butt of them, in this glimpse behind the weird world of comedy. Sarah Silverman, Tig Notaro, Jim Jefferies and Doug Stanhope also star.(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy.(n)

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks
programme.desc: A quartet of siblings gather at the North Carolina home of their dying mother, where squabbling, bickering, and ultimately, emotional healing and grace, are in the offing. Sally Field and Ben Chaplin lead the cast of this ensemble comedy-drama, costarring Julianne Nicholson and Tom Cavanagh.(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).(n)

programme.title: Rush: Time Stand Still
programme.desc: Narrated by Paul Rudd, this documentary chronicles the final major tour of legendary rock band Rush. Featuring interviews with the band and never-before seen footage, the film features behind-the-scenes views of historic moments from the perspective of the band, their fans, crew and management throughout their sold-out 40th anniversary tour.(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In the 1860's, Hugh Crain finances the construction of Hill House, then dies an unexplained death. Tales circulate that the mansion is haunted by evil spirits. 130 years later, Dr. David Marrow (Liam Neeson), long fascinated by the Hill House legend, brings three people there for what he tells them will be a study in sleep disorders. They're outwardly brave, but it soon becomes evident that Hill House's sinister reputation has all of them on edge. Catherine Zeta-Jones, Lili Taylor and Owen Wilson costar.(n)

programme.title: Mistrust
programme.desc: Happy, beautiful and independent, Veronica enjoys being a mistress. No commitment, no strings and she never has to be vulnerable. She has carefully laid every brick in the walls of the fortress surrounding her heart. She's safe and having a great time. However, there is one person who knew her heart before those walls were erected, her best friend Brandon, who has stood by her for too many years to count. And while Veronica has tried to keep her feelings at bay, he is the one who holds the key that opens her Pandora's box of emotions.(n)

programme.title: Bipolar Rock 'N' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health. Follow his journey as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt.(n)

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.(n)

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.(n)

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Mrs McCutcheon
programme.desc: Having always felt he was born in the wrong body, 10-year-old Tom chooses the name Mrs McCutcheon rather than the name he was given at birth; he also prefers the flow of a dress rather than the cut of a pant. Now at his third school, Tom is having trouble settling in and finding acceptance from his newfound peers - except for Trevor, a tough little charmer who also suffers prejudice due to his Aboriginal heritage.(n)

programme.desc: Ted's favorite author, Howard Bellweather, protests Brian's Hero Award while collecting his own, Emmett works for men who are similar to the politically correct characters of the fabulous new gay TV drama, "Gay as Blazes," and Michael wants to reconnect with Brian at a comic-book convention.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: Brilliant medical student Michael (Oscar Isaac) meets beautiful dance instructor Ana (Charlotte Le Bon) in late 1914. Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.(n)

programme.title: A Better Life
programme.desc: Carlos Galindo (Demian Bichir) dreamed of good things for his wife and son when they crossed the border into the US. After his wife leaves him, Carlos' only goal was to make sure his son Luis was given the opportunities he never had. After years of hard work, he still finds himself drifting apart from Luis, now a teenager, who is susceptible to peer pressures. Carlos borrows what little money he can and invests it all into his own gardening business, hoping to finally achieve the better life he always envisioned for his son.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars.(n)

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: When they discover that a friend is going to die before the release of the long-awaited next chapter in a massively successful sci-fi movie franchise, a group of diehard sci-fi geeks travels cross country to steal a print from a legendary filmmaker, encountering everything along the way from rabidly rival fans of a competing epic series, to Las Vegas strippers. Jay Baruchel, Dan Fogler, Sam Huntington and Christopher Marquette star in this hilarious road trip comedy.(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
programme.desc: Gary Oldman stars as a retired secret agent who is pulled back into the game to ferret out a Soviet agent in MI6. Also starring Academy Award winner Colin Firth, Tom Hardy, Mark Strong, Ciaran Hinds, and Benedict Cumberbatch.(n)

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell (Nicole Kidman) rejects the stifling rigidity of life in turn-of-the-century England, leaving it behind for a chance to travel to Tehran. She begins her lifelong adventure across the Arab world, a journey marked by danger, a passionate affair with a British officer (James Franco), and an encounter with the legendary T.E. Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).(n)

programme.desc: Despite the objections of his friends and family, Michael decides to continue dating HIV-positive Ben. Emmett's ego is swelled by the success of Ted's porn web site, while Lindsay and Melanie struggle to get Lindsay's parents to cough up some money for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Trailer-dwelling, sewage-pumping Chip (Matthew Gray Gubler) has got one thing going for him: he's head over heels infatuated with his girlfriend Liza (AnnaLynne McCord). He's more than willing to overlook her wild streak—the fact that she's hooking up with their landlord; her rather extreme mood swings —so when she proposes a plot to steal $68,000, he goes along with the plan. But when what was supposed to be a simple heist turns into an off-the-rails, blood-spattered crime spree.(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: AmERIKan Warrior
programme.desc: The comedian returns for his second Showtime special. While tackling subjects like white guilt, the national anthem and the righteously religious, he simultaneously skewers his own sense of male entitlement. Recorded in Portland, OR, Erik holds a mirror up to his audience's hypocrisies and nudges them into laughter while doing some corrective rejiggering on recently accepted societal norms.(n)

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff (Casey Affleck) in a small West Texas town of the 1950's tries with increasing desperation to hide his tortured, sadomasochistic affair with a prostitute (Jessica Alba), as well as the fact that he is a serial killer. Kate Hudson costars in this gritty, hard-boiled drama.(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas.(n)

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, Charlie Wilson is a womanizing US congressional representative from Texas who is a member of two major foreign policy and covert-ops committees. After being prodded by his major conservative supporter, Houston Socialite Joanne Herring, Wilson learns about the plight the people are suffering in the brutal Soviet occupation of Afghanistan. With the help of maverick CIA agent Gustav Avrakotos, Wilson dedicates his canny political efforts to supply the Afghan mujahideen with the weapons and support to defeat the Soviet Union.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Episode #211
programme.desc: Lindsay and Melanie's wedding day approaches despite numerous obstacles and the hostility of the zodiac, but Brian has won two tickets to the Miami White Party (which falls on the same weekend), and Emmett has finally saved enough money for the buttocks-enhancement surgery he's always wanted.(n)

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.(n)

programme.title: 2017 Episode 2
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final four teams of the Stanley Cup® Playoffs, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports.(n)

programme.title: 2017 Episode 3
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final two teams in the Stanley Cup® Final, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports.(n)

programme.title: 2017 Episode 4
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look into the Stanley Cup® Final as two teams battle it out, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports.(n)

programme.title: 2017 Episode 5
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the final battle for the most elusive prize in all of sports as the Pittsburgh Penguins hoist the Stanley Cup® for the second year in a row. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the future, the Navy has developed a fighter jet piloted by artificial intelligence. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific, under the command of stern Capt. George Cummings (Sam Shepard). The Navy has also chosen three pilots for a new generation of stealth fighter-bombers, designed to instantly respond to sightings of terrorists anywhere in the world. When the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who must stop it before it precipitates a nuclear war. Also starring Jessica Biel, Josh Lucas and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: This movie chronicles the journey of a group of enslaved Africans who overtake their captor's ship and attempt to return to their beloved homeland. When the ship is seized, the captives are brought to the United States where they are charged with murder and await their fate in prison. A courtroom battle ensues that captures the attention of the entire nation. For the men and woman on trial, it's simply a fight for the basic right of freedom. Directed by Steven Spielberg.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Harsh Times
programme.desc: Christian Bale delivers a bravura performance as an unhinged Gulf War veteran leading his boyhood best friend (Freddy Rodriguez) astray during a drug-fueled foray into the seedier side of Los Angeles in this gritty drama. Eva Longoria costars.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the president of the United States. Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid) and Kent Taylor (Mathew Fox) are two Secret Service agents assigned to protect President Ashton (William Hurt) at a landmark summit on the global war on terror. When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide in the hunt for the assassin.(n)

programme.title: Elmsley Count
programme.desc: Axe dominates a capital raise event, but is soon challenged by an unexpected competitor. Chuck looks to strike the ultimate blow on an enemy. Wendy reckons with past decisions, and chooses a side. Connerty confronts Sacker about Chuck's activities. Taylor takes a big position. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: Spoonful of Sex
programme.desc: When a café owner finds a love poem left in a book, she believes it was left by a secret admirer which leads to a mistaken identity whirlwind affair. And when the poem is passed from person to person in her small town, it awakens desire and changes the course of people's lives.(n)

programme.title: Eddie Griffin: Undeniable
programme.desc: This comedy special is Griffin's magnum opus about the world, relationships and humanity as a whole. He celebrates his 30-year anniversary in comedy by being on stage and pulling laughter from his fans during the live taping.(n)

programme.title: College (2008)
programme.desc: Fraternity members haze three prospective students during a drunken orgy of a college-visitation weekend in this campus comedy starring Drake Bell, Kevin Covais and Andrew Caldwell.(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Daniel Craig stars as a dealer that has made a fortune selling cocaine and ecstasy. Now he's looking to retire while he's young enough to enjoy his gains. Crime boss Jimmy Price (Kenneth Cranham) needs a couple of favors first. The drug addict daughter of a mob overlord (Michael Gambon) has gone missing and Price wants her tracked down. Price also wants a middleman to buy a huge shipment of ecstasy from a loose-cannon crook called The Duke (Jamie Foreman).(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)
